Name: Full Circle (by Ryan Mowat)
Ingredients: 5 ml Lustau Palo Cortado Península Sherry
Instructions: Rinse chilled glass with sherry and set aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and fine strain into pre-rinsed glass.
History: Created in 2016 by Ryan Mowat at The Finnieston Bar & Restaurant, Glasgow for Jack Daniel’s Tennessee Calling competition.
